text:
Check out Fassbender’s new photos

Three new pictures of Michael Fassbender in Assassin’s Creed have landed online. The new shots reveal the dual roles that Fassbender plays — as both Callum Lynch and his Assassin ancestor Aguilar. In the Assassin’s Creed movie, Callum must gather enough knowledge about the ancient Assassins to defeat their rivals the Templars once and for all. — PTI
title: ENT-FASSBENDER
